src:
Maksimalan poraz Vojvodine u Rumuniji
06 Nov 2019, 18:06 by Milos
Vojvodina NS seme, prvak Srbije poražena je u prvoj utakmici 2. runde kvalifikacija za CEV Ligu šampiona 2020. Rumunska Arkada je u Galaciju pobedila ekipu iz Novog Sadasa 3:0, po setovima 25:23, 25:17 i 25:21, posle 77 minuta igre.
Revanš utakmica će se odigrati naredne srede, 13. novembra u maloj sali SPC Vojvodina u Novom Sadu od 17.30 časova.
Po propozicijama CEV, za pobede od 3:0 i 3:1 pobednik dobija 3 boda. Ukoliko se meč završi rezultatom 3:2, pobednik dobija 2, a poraženi 1 bod. Ukoliko obe ekipe imaju isti broj pobeda i bodova, o ukupnom pobedniku će odlučiti „zlatni set“, koji će se odigrati odmah po završetku druge utakmice. „Zlatni set“ se igra do 15 poena.
Ukoliko eliminišu Rumune, Novosađani će u 3. rundi (19 – 21. novembra i 26 – 28. novembra) igrati protiv pobednika dvomeča Šahtjor Soligorsk (BLR) – VaLePa Sastamala (FIN).
Poražena ekipa iz duela Vojvodina NS seme – Arkada Galaci igraće u šesnaestini finala Kupa CEV 2020. protiv Savo Volej Kuopija iz Finske. Prvi meč će se odigrati 11. decembra u Finskoj, a revanš sedam dana kasnije u Rumuniji ili Srbiji.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Maximum defeat of Vojvodina in Romania
06 Nov 2019, 17:06 by Milos
Vojvodina NS seed, Serbian champion was defeated in the first game of the 2nd round of the CEV Champions League qualification 2020. Romanian Arcade beat the team from Novi Sad 3: 0 in Galati, by sets 25:23, 25:17 and 25:21, after 77 minutes of play.
The rematch will be played next Wednesday, November 13th in the small hall of SPC Vojvodina in Novi Sad from 5.30 pm.
According to CEV regulations, the winner gets 3 points for 3-0 and 3-1 wins. If the match ends with a score of 3: 2, the winner gets 2 points and the loser 1 point. If both teams have the same number of wins and points, the overall winner will decide the "golden set", which will be played immediately after the end of the second game. The Golden Set is played up to 15 points.
If the Romanians are eliminated, the Novosadans will play against Shakhtyor Soligorsk (BLR) - VaLePa Sastamala (FIN) in the 3rd round (19 - 21 November and 26 - 28 November).
The defeated team from the duel of Vojvodina NS seed - Arcade Galati will play in the sixteenth finals of the CEV 2020 Cup against Savoy Volley Kuopi of Finland. The first match will be played on December 11 in Finland, and a rematch seven days later in Romania or Serbia.
